hotels.title: Cosmopolitan Cardiff Escape with Rooftop Steakhouse & Terrace
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in Wales' buzzing capital when you stay at Hotel Indigo Cardiff, an IHG Hotel, a sophisticated designer escape just a five-minute walk to Cardiff Castle. Spend days exploring the city: catch a rugby match with the locals at Cardiff Arms Park, listen to local music at the Motorpoint Arena, or peruse tasty treats at Cardiff Market. For dinner, head to the hotel's rooftop for cocktails and succulent steaks at Marco Pierre White Steakhouse & Bar, the ideal way to cap off your day.
